newsitem.title: USA: Texas/w Okla feedlot cattle Friday roundup - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Texas/w Okla feedlot cattle Friday roundup - USDA.

text.p: Trade was moderate on Friday, USDA said. Slaughter steers and heifers were steady.
Feedlots reporting good inquiry from buyers. Sales reported on 13,700 slaughter steers and 6,600 heifers following weekly movement of 94,100.
Confirmed - 20,300 Last Week - None Year Ago - 800
Note - all cattle prices based on net weights FOB the feedlot after a 4 percent shrink.
Slaughter Steers - Select and Choice 2-3 1100-1250 lbs 64.00, pen North Plains 64.25. Slaughter Heifers - Select and Choice 2-3 1000-1150 lbs 64.00.
